abstract: CNN will expand the anchor Rick Sanchez’s time slot to two hours, from 3 p.m. to 5 p.m. Eastern and rename the hours “Rick’s List.”
snippet: CNN will expand the anchor Rick Sanchez’s time slot to two hours, from 3 p.m. to 5 p.m. Eastern and rename the hours “Rick’s List.”
lead_paragraph: CNN is making a big change to its daytime news coverage. The network said Tuesday that it would expand the anchor Rick Sanchez’s time slot to two hours, from 3 p.m. to 5 p.m. Eastern and rename the hours “Rick’s List.” The changes are effective Jan. 18.

headline.main: CNN Expands Sanchez Show (and Gives It a New Name)
